title: Who is the artist of 2 typographic art pieces in the current Pottery Barn catalogue?
content:
In the current Pottery Barn catalog, there are 2 typographic art pieces on page 70 (also see attached image). Does anyone know who the artist that made these is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [img60l.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822174521/http:/typophile.com/files/img60l.jpg) | 75.02 KB |
author: saycreative

comments.content:
Did you try contacting Pottery Barn about this?

- Mike Yanega

Reminds me of [the brilliant work](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822174521/http:/collection.artgallery.nsw.gov.au/collection/results.do?view=screen&dept=&db=object&id=29978) of [Rosalie Gascoigne](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822174521/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rosalie_Gascoigne), but I don't think these are hers.
Yes I agree with you Stephen. I'd say that the Pottery Barn pieces owe a clear debt to Rosalie Gascoignes roadsign assemblages.
